import React from "react"; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from "react-tabs"; import Hero from "../../components/hero/HeroLight"; import Index from "../../components/about/index"; import Address from "../../components/Address"; import Portfolio from "../../components/portfolio/PortfolioLight"; import Blog from "../../components/blog/BlogLight"; import Contact from "../../components/Contact"; import Social from "../../components/Social"; import AnimatedCursor from "react-animated-cursor"; const menuItem = [ { icon: "fa-home", menuName: "Accueil" }, { icon: "fa-user", menuName: "A propos" }, { icon: "fa-briefcase", menuName: "Portfolio" }, { icon: "fa-envelope-open", menuName: "Contact" }, { icon: "fa-comments", menuName: "Blog" }, ]; const HomeLight = () => { document.body.classList.add("light"); return (
{menuItem.map((item, i) => (

{item.menuName}
